bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jiu zha 酒齇 , wine sediments. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hu shi 槲實 quotes Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 : 鼻上齇皰，出膿血者，以泔水煮槲葉，取汁洗之，拭乾， 納槲葉灰少許於中，良 , “For sediment blisters on the nose releasing pus and blood boil the leaves of hu with water from washing rice, use the liquid to wash [the blisters], rub them dry, and insert a small amount of a hu -leaves ashes into them. Good”.
